title: Faraday and Company
overview: Dan Dailey stars as private detective Frank Faraday in this 90-minute series, which will share this time period along with "Banacek," "Tenafly'' and "The Snoop Sisters." Dan Dailey returns in a series as a private eye, Frank Faraday. Format calls for Faraday, having served 28 years in a South American jail for a crime he didn't commit, to return to the United States. Not only does he come home to a new era, but a son he didn't know he had (James Naughton). They team up as detectives, with Faraday determined to get the man who killed his old partner.Â
